entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT is too resource hungry #73522
  • Can't get ASP.NET Core app routes to work when hosted via hostfxr in native app #73516
  • [API Proposal]: Be able to skip the Chain in ChainedPartitionedRateLimiter #73513
  • System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture returns InvariantCulture on iOS #73512
  • [MONO][TEST] Android arm64 Runtime tests run.sh doesn't use the right script name #73510

Closed

  • URIBuilder misinterpret "domain:port" format as "scheme:path" #73521
  • crossgen2 --instruction-set has no apparent effect on .NET 6 class library #63241
    7.0.0
  • Http2Connection over async NamedPipe transport hangs when writing preface when Server is waiting for the client to Synchronize. #73097
  • system.net.security.tests.negotiateauthenticationkerberostest.loopback_success #73343
    7.0.0
  • LinqBenchmarks.Where00ForX has regressed on x86 #67968
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Internal error (USER_CANCELLED) when trying to establish a connection #73151
    7.0.0
  • Assert in SigPointer::GetTypeHandleThrowing #73503
  • ILASM roundtrip fails on `poison.sh` #72127
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve NullabilityInfoContext behavior for ByRef types. #73520
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] crypto deadlock CI test #73519
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Delete some old Jenkins scripts #73514
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int. #73511
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] delete the emitIns_R_R_Imm(). #73509
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Update heap hard limit for large pages #73508
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [Test] Lower the Kerberos principal expiration time #73515
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Process incoming frames before sending frames for Http2Connection. #73307
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize DateTime.Year/.DayOfYear properties; fix comments #73277
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for BitOperations.PopCount in AOT mode. #73147
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] just fix the crypto logging #73468
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Apply some obvious rich debug info optimizations #73373
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add release branches to jitrollingbuild.yml #73276
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Map USER_CANCELED to AuthenticationException #73444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix ThreadAbort on Unix and reenable the related tests #73399
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Temporarily disable the KerberosExecutor tests on ARM32 to unblock CI #73445
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] rewrite crypto-worker to typescript #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mini] Fix the bounds check in GET_BBLOCK #73493
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Avoid accounting work on 32-bit platforms #73491
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • make SIP not on by default #73434
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr

Updated

  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Recoup some of the perf losses in cold start serialization #73497
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable JitDisasm in Release #73365
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • More precise writebarrier for regions #67389
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Implement additional asymmetric signature and encryption overloads #73502
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update for recent compiler changes for ref fields #73466
    area-System.Text.Json, blocked
  • Undefined behavior with null #73507
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotations on IEquatable/IComparable constraints #73495
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • Vectorize IndexOfAnyExcept<T>(T value) #73488
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] asset loading for workers #73484
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Assert.Null failed for Mono in System.Reflection.Emit #73504
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add Directory.CreateTempSubdirectory #73408
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAot] Triage another 14 libs tests #73442
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Use DOTNET_DiagnosticPorts to configure Diagnostic Server #73370
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Trigger all the AOT library tests when relevant paths have #73425
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • PlatformNotSupportedException for UNIX domain sockets on iOS/tvOS #73374
  • Bump TraceEventVersion to 3.0.3 #71813
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Enable Dop_WorkersCreatedRespectingLimitAndTaskScheduler_Sync test #73486
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Fix issue where calculation of valuetypeshapecharacteristic on Arm64 does not match native runtime #73406
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • CI: Add support in yml for detecting darc dependency changes in `eng/Version.Details.xml` #73435
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • COSE: Add documentation and exception correction #73394
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Refactor input bubble checks to work in non-composite scenarios #73350
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • `runtime-staging`: Enable failed tests on stable jobs to fail the job #73400
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
